price: (65) Then they reversed themselves,[893] [saying], "You have already known that these do not speak!"
arabic: ثُمَّ نُكِسُواْ عَلَىٰ رُءُوسِهِمۡ لَقَدۡ عَلِمۡتَ مَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ يَنطِقُونَ
footnotes: [893]- After first admitting their error, they were seized by pride and obstinacy.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: thumma nukisū ʿalā ruūsihim laqad ʿalim'ta mā hāulāi yanṭiqūna
